name: GDG DevFest Kota Kinabalu 2017
description:
Get together with other aspiring and active developers for this half-day Developer Festival! GDG DevFest is globally run by local communities throughout August to November 2017, and offer speaker sessions, hackathons, codelabs, and more across multiple product areas.

Discover and learn more on Google technologies. Our programme is as follows:

12:30-13:00 Registration
13:00-13:15 Welcoming remarks
13:15-14:00 Techtalk: TensorFlow & Machine Learning
14:15-15:00 Techtalk: Progressive Web & Chrome
15:00-15:30 Tea break
15:30-17:00 Codelab: Android
17:00-17:45 Techtalk: Android
17:45-18:00 Closing remarks and lucky draw

Limited seat available, so RSVP quickly! #DevFest17 #GDGKKK #TensorFlow #Android #ProgressiveWebApp
how_to_find_us: Reach out to us via Facebook.com/GDGKotaKinabalu or Twitter.com/GDGKotaKinabalu

name: Mobile Site Certification Study Jams 2017 (Facilitators Edition)
description:
• What we'll do
Study Jams are community-run study groups for developers covering a range of Google Developers content. Typically, Study Jams focus on completing a course, but some may focus on mastering a skill or product area. The Study Jams objective is to raise the technical proficiency of global community members through the highest possible course completion rate.

Mobile now accounts for over half of all web traffic. Users expect their small-screen experiences to be as quick and intuitive as those on desktop. But making the mobile web fast and easy takes some special skills.
The Mobile Site Certification is a a professional accreditation offered by Google, and aims at demonstrating an understanding in basic and advanced aspects of mobile website design and development.

• What to bring
Laptop, broadband connection

• Important to know
Requirements: You need basic web development skills to take part. Takes about 3-4 hours, plus a 90-minute exam.
On completion, you will receive an official Google certification and a link of your achievement in your personalised Google professional profile.

This is a special session for those interested in becoming facilitators for subsequent Mobile Site Study Jams. We have other meetups that will be scheduled for the public. Check out the GDG Kota Kinabalu main page for a list of other Study Jam meetups you can participate in.

name: Mobile Site Certification Study Jams 2017 (Open Edition)
description:
Dear all, due to unavailability of our venue, this meetup is unfortunately postponed. TENTATIVE date is on 13th January 2018 (Sat). Details of this event will be posted once we have confirmed the venue.
On behalf of GDG Kota Kinabalu, I sincerely apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding. -- Lorna

name: Women Techmakers Mobile Site Certification Study Jam
description:
The Meetup RSVP section for this event is closed. Please register at our EventBrite page to join: https://wtmkkmsitestudyjam.eventbrite.com
All updates and details are also posted in our EventBrite page.

TENTATIVE PROGRAMME
9.00 am: Registration and refreshments
10.00 am
- Opening remarks by Women Techmakers KK team
- Tutorial: Creating Your First Mobile Site
12.00 pm: Lunch
1.00 pm
- Crash Course: Google Mobile Site Certification
- Mobile Site Certification Assessment
3.00 pm: End

(Optional)[masked]pm: Take the online Google Mobile Site Certification examination
how_to_find_us: Look for "Taipan Net Station" in Google Maps.

description: In collaboration with GEG Labuan. By invitation.

name: GDG DevFest 2019 Kota Kinabalu
description:
GDG DevFest 2018 is our annual all-day developer conference that offers speaker sessions across multiple product areas, codelabs, and more!

AGENDA:
12:00 PM Registration
1:00 PM Opening and Welcoming
1:15 PM Talk 1
2:15 PM Coffee Break / Networking
2:30 PM Codelab 2
3:30 PM Coffee Break / Networking
3:45 PM Demo 1
4:45 PM Coffee Break / Networking
5:00 PM Demo 2 OR Codelab 2
6:00 PM Closing and Group Photo
how_to_find_us: Exact event location to be announced.
